content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Complex at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore, with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Smelting Complex at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal, with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Additional Furnaces for Iron Smelting
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
